author: peti7788
title: Official alternative built is much better
review:
I have already written about this set in its 1978 European version. So now I will not re-describe the pros and cons. However, I found a photo on the back of the box that offers official alternative builds if you get bored of the original vehicle.

The problem in the previous description was that the minifigure could not be placed in the vehicle. Here is a version you can. Obviously it's a tiller truck. I just don’t understand why this isn’t the main construction. So here I have to apologize to the designer for criticizing his work. It was quite hard work to come up with so many versions of the parts in the set.
